messages.subject: Re: Unschooling article, with some stats
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thanks Sandra! It was such a last minute thing. The author was very patient with me after asking a couple weeks ago, but her deadline was looming so I
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
>
> Who knows if the stats are right, but the quotes from Ren Allen are
> wonderful!
>


Thanks Sandra!
It was such a last minute thing. The author was very patient with me after asking a couple weeks ago, but her deadline was looming so I finally answered her questions just last night...it was late and I was tired. Wasn't sure if I was making sense or not.;)

Ren
radicalunschooling.blogspot.com

messages.subject: Unschooling article, with some stats
messages.msgSnippet: Who knows if the stats are right, but the quotes from Ren Allen are wonderful! I linked it here because I can remember this: http://unschooling.blogspot.com
messages.messageBody:
Who knows if the stats are right, but the quotes from Ren Allen are
wonderful!

I linked it here because I can remember this:
http://unschooling.blogspot.com

They say there are 200,000 unschoolers in the U.S. (I think they're
talking U.S.). Interesting, and it doesn't surprise me as high or
low, but I do wonder where it might've come from (that number). It
came from plotting a curve with percentages from something Pat Farenga
said a few years ago, but still...



Sandra
